Description_lang: Call forth a Sentinel Owl to the target location within $R yds, granting you unhindered vision. $?s388056[You and your party's][Your] attacks ignore line of sight against any target in this area.$?s388057[While the Sentinel Owl is active, your party gains $393777s1% Leech.][]Every $?a137015[$393505s5]?a137016[$393505s6][$393505s7] Focus spent grants you $393505s2 sec of the Sentinel Owl when cast, up to a maximum of $393505s3 sec. The Sentinel Owl can only be summoned when it will last at least $393505s4 sec.
AuraDescription_lang: Ignoring line of sight to enemies in the targeted area.
